text: Rodrigo Muxfeldt Gularte (13 July 1972, Foz do Iguaçu, Brazil – 29 April 2015, Central Java, Indonesia) was a Brazilian drug-trafficker. He was executed in Indonesia by firing squad for drug trafficking after being sentenced in 2006. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Brazilian criminals Category:Drug dealers Category:People from Paraná State
title: Rodrigo Gularte
